title: Digiday+ Research: A guide to ad-supported streaming services, from the top
excerpt: The first installment of Digiday's two-part series on the top ad-supported streaming services provides an overview of the platformsâ€™ offerings and an analysis of how brands and agencies distribute their ad budgets and ad placements across platforms.

title: Research Briefing: Frequency capping matters most on streaming platforms
excerpt: In this edition of the Digiday+ Research Briefing, we examine the top ad attributes marketers want from ad-supported streaming platforms, how brands are increasing their marketing spend on YouTube, and how Walmart and Roblox are teaming up to make virtual e-commerce a reality, as seen in recent data from Digiday+ Research.
